translations.translation: when the graves are emptied out,
When the graves are overturned,
and when graves are laid open,
and the graves are turned inside out,
And when the graves are overturned.
And when the graves Bu`thirat.
And when the graves are laid open,
when the tombs are overthrown,
And the sepulchres are overturned,
and when the graves are laid open:
And when the graves are ransacked,
when the graves are overturned,
And when the Graves are turned upside down;-
And when the graves are turned upside down (and they bring out their contents)
when the graves are overturned,
When the tombs are strewn around.
And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
[82:4] and when the tombs are overturned, [when] their earth [above them] is dug up and its dead are raised (the response to idhā, ‘when’, and all that is supplemented thereto is [the following]):
(And the sepulchres are overturned) the dead in them are taken out,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ } معناه أُثيرتْ

translations.translation:
And when the graves are overturned

And when the graves are opened

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text: { وإذا القبور } أي: الأبدان { بعثرت } بحثت وأخرج ما فيها من الأرواح والقوى

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ } المندرسة المتنكسة التي لم يبق في أجوافها شيء من أمارات عالم الناسوت { بُعْثِرَتْ } [الانفطار: 4] قلبت وبحثرت، وخرج من مطاوبها ما فيها من حصة عالم اللاهوت
